climbs.name: Totem Pole
climbs.fa: Fritz Wiessner, Lawrence Coveney, Percy Olton, and Marguerite Schnellbacher (1936)

content.description:
Though historic (via first ascent party), the climbing quality is just so-so...nothing to write home about. 

  Ascend chimney, flake, establish belay at bolt, flake, etc. Move left around corner, up second chimney - big pro if you got it - (Note - some rate this section as 10b!), climb face to top.
content.protection: Standard rack. Large cam for second chimney. Anchors.

content.description: Solitary spire rising from an angular chunk of rock, next to the road/guardrail. From Sylvan Lake, past Needle's Eye, around a couple hairpin turns, down the road from Reunion Rock, Dave's Dinghy. Park at near-by pull-off.
